descriptions: Added compatibility for external dispatch scripts (rcore_dispatch, core_dispatch, opto_dispatch, tk-dispatch) in Config.Dispatch.Integration
Added custom server event to easily integrate custom dispatch alerts (more information available at wiki.qfdevelopers.com)
Added and corrected missing language translations
Improved the functionality of camera flashlight
Improved the functionality of the automatic mugshots system
Improved responsibility and increased smoothness of gallery camera
Improved overall script optimization at client-side
Fixed issue with manually cleared citizen invoices
Fixed issue with camera blocked keys
